intent_atoms.description: VoiceOver must announce focus command menus and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware verification.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG-H real‑world assets for regression baselines.
Surface ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specs are finalized.
Streaming parse events must propagate ParseIssue severity, offsets, and reason codes to UI/CLI consumers.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verify macOS and iPadOS hardware focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets for VoiceOver accessibility shortcuts.

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secure licensing approvals and fixtures for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, and MPEG‑H to enable regression baselines using real-world media assets.

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Surface Metrics in SwiftUI
functional_units.description: Display ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specifications are finalized.

functional_units.name: Emit Parse Events with Severity Metadata
functional_units.description: Stream parse events that include severity, offsets, and reason codes to UI and CLI consumers.
